main event: Bright white light, circular in appearance, observed hovering at a low altitude. It darted and changed color to red with a blue streak before moving northeast rapidly.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5-10 minutes., The object remained mostly stationary before making darting movements., It changed color from white to red with blue streaks., The object might be a balloon based on further data., The observation was made visually from the ground.
witness description: instrument mechanic at Savannah River Project
